divs: Sighting DetailsBetween 8:15pm and 8:45pm I was looking at the western sky and saw a shiny object in flight it didn't last long. I few minutes I saw another and told my wife to look at it too by the clouds...she looked at the wrong clouds saw nothing. She saw the next one and told me to look!!! And the 4th went by shortly after. Granted there are a lot of jets flying by because Charlotte Int Airport is nearby....but when we see them they disappear over the horizon and always leave a trail behind them...these 4 objects just disappeared. They traveled in a straight line in the exact same path as the previous ones.
